entry.title: New release for Litlyx: Time Zone Accuracy Improvement
entry.content:
We’ve updated Litlyx to a newer, more stable version!

Our date tracking is now the most accurate on the market! We’ve implemented internal timezone handling, so you no longer need to worry about it.

We’ve also made some UI improvements to make everything clearer and more user-friendly.

Additionally, we’ve added new timeframe options, such as "Current Month" and "Last Month," which offer different visualizations of the dashboard.

We hope you love these updates! As always, we’re open to feedback, so please share your thoughts and continue being an amazing part of our journey.

Thanks so much to each and every one of you!

entry.title: New release for Litlyx: Docker Images on Docker Hub
entry.content: In this release, we've opted to publish our Docker images on Docker Hub, allowing you to skip the 'docker compose build' step. Simply run 'docker compose up' to automatically pull the required images and get Litlyx running smoothly.

entry.title: New release for Litlyx: Dark & Light mode + New Docker Images
entry.content:
In this release:

  • Introduced a light mode for the dashboard.
  • Updated Docker images on Docker Hub, enabling you to run docker compose up without manually building images.
  • Enhanced graphics for better visual experience.
  • Resolved bugs related to self-hosting.

entry.title: New release for Litlyx: Filtering Unlimited Domains within a Project(workspace)
entry.content:
Finally the most wanted feature ever on Litlyx is here: Filtering Domain in the same project (workspace).

in this release:

  1. Filter domains… now users are capable of switching through unlimited domain in each project (workspace)
  2. We’ve changed the label “Snapshot” with “Timeframe”
  3. Added a navigation top bar on the platform
  4. Added a help widget
  5. Added a feedback widget
  6. Added a docs button
  7. Changed the ui card Top Domains in Top Pages, as we now give the chance to filter between domains in the top bar
  8. Top pages now have a show more to view all pages
  9. Moved the Light/Dark toggle button on the top bar
  10. General ui improvements

Bug Fixing:

  1. Avarage Session time Calculation was at x10 the correct amount. We are sorry for the inconvenient

entry.title: New release for Litlyx: Admin User Selfhosted + Bug fixing
entry.content:
In this release:

Self Hosted: - Now there is username and password before login, and admin access is no longer available. (see docs) - docker-compose.yaml file changed with two new fields

Bug Fixing: - Remove loading label from top cards when takes too long - Remove refresh button next to "All Domains" - Update "Update Domains" → Change to "Manage" with a settings (gear) icon - Settings with Path support - Fix text casing: "ALL DOMAINS" → "All Domains" - Fix confirmation email status returning 400 ERROR - CSV export for events - Fix 500 error on reports - Fix "Litlyx All Time" error on chart - Fix "litlyx-landing" last week AI visits showing 2000 instead of 800 - Ensure "Custom Tab" is active in WHITE - Fix "?" issue on stacked events bar chart
